songs.title: Man of the Year*
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Cheers
Sippin' codeine like it's beer
I'm all on this song screaming "Cheers"

[Verse 1]
Man of the year, still got problems
Lookin' in the mirror, you look awful
Talkin' to myself, do it too often
JK, Juice WRLD, you're so awesome
Um, running up funds
Bottle full of pills, let's have fun
No cheap thrills, only rich ones
Fire drills, hotter than the sun
They say life's a puzzle, well we'll piece it together
But from the way I'm movin' up, prolly be piecing forever
I date a bad bitch, she'll be over decent forever
Ain't no fake tips, these other hoes just decent forever
My lady said she saw Betty in the hotel lobby
Well love, let's fuck her together
We got the world to our backs and the fun will never end
Middle fingers up, we're screaming fuck 'em forever

[Chorus]
Let's raise our hands, let's sing and dance
I know lyrics my saved you, I know my lyrics saved you
Let's raise our hands, let's sing and dance
I know lyrics my saved you, I know I helped you break through

[Verse 2]
Buzzin' like I'm light year, infinity and beyond
Big head and in my mind I'm lost and-
